name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

name: The Godfather
description: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

name: The Godfather Part II
description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed, while his son expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate.

name: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham City into anarchy and forces the Dark Knight ever closer to crossing the line between hero and vigilante.

name: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in tales of violence and redemption.

name: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.

name: Fight Club
description: An insomniac office worker and a soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.

name: The Empire Strikes Back
description: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.
